text:
Dreams: What Happens When We Sleep?

Have you ever flown in your sleep? Or talked to a giant cat? Dreams are strange and fun! They happen when we sleep — mostly during deep sleep.

Our brain is still busy when we sleep. It makes pictures, sounds, and stories. These are our dreams. Sometimes we remember them, sometimes we forget.

Scientists don’t know exactly why we dream. Maybe dreams help us learn or feel better. Some people even write their dreams in a notebook when they wake up!

To dream well, get good sleep. Turn off your phone, close your eyes, and relax. Who knows? Maybe tonight you’ll fly to the moon!
